crazyballrun.game.graphics

Class RenderThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • crazyballrun.game.graphics.RenderThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RenderThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    The RenderThread renders 2D images.

      Defines the current state of the ample (-1 means no ample, 0 means red is active, 1 means red and yellow are active, 2 just yellow, 3 yellow and green and 4 just green).

      • switchState

        public void switchState(boolean inGame)
        Switches the current state of the RenderThread (in-game- or GUI-rendering).
        Parameters:
        inGame - if 'true' the current level's cameras are rendered, otherwise the current GUI-Frame

      • setAmple

        public void setAmple(int index)
        Defines the current state of the ample (-1 means no ample, 0 means red is active, 1 means red and yellow are active, 2 just yellow, 3 yellow and green and 4 just green).
        Parameters:
        index - ample index (state of the ample)
